--- In neat@yahoogroups.com, Jeff Clune <jeffclune@...> wrote:
>
>=
 Hello all-
> 
> In Jason's HyperNEAT C++ code,  I am trying to enforce tha=
t the champion of
> each species is preserved.
> 
> I have a population siz=
e of 15 (small, I know) and a SpeciesSizeTarget of 3
> (to have 5 orgs per =
species).
> 
> I set smallestSpeciesSizeWithElitism to 1.0 (so every specie=
s should have
> elitism), and then I rate orgs like so
> 
> Org/Fitness
> 
=
> A - 1000
> B - 500
> C - 500
> All the rest 1
> 
> Presumably A, B, and C=
 should be preserved in the next generation, but that
> does not happen. I =
only get A.
> 
> I figured maybe elitism only applied to mutation and not c=
rossover, so I set
> MutateOnlyProbability to 1.0, but that did not solve t=
he problem.
> 
> Any ideas?
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Best regards,
> Jeff Clune
> 
> P=
ostdoctoral Fellow

> Corn=
ell University
